mapper.insert: insert into sys_organization (id, `name`, `desc`, create_time, create_user, update_user, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into sys_organization
id,
`name`,
`desc`,
create_time,
create_user,
update_user,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update sys_organization
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_organization set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
delete from sys_organization where id in
#{itemId}
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.`name`, s.`desc`, s.create_time, s.create_user, s.update_user, s.update_time, ( select group_concat(u.real_name) from sys_user_organization uo,sys_user u where uo.user_id = u.id and uo.organization_id = s.id ) members FROM sys_organization s where 1=1

SELECT s.id, s.`name`, s.`desc`, s.create_time, s.create_user, s.update_user, s.update_time, ( select group_concat(u.real_name) from sys_user_organization uo,sys_user u where uo.user_id = u.id and uo.organization_id = s.id ) members FROM sys_organization s where 1=1
and ( s.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') or s.`desc` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') )

SELECT s.id, s.`name`, s.`desc`, s.create_time, s.create_user, s.update_user, s.update_time, ( select group_concat(u.real_name) from sys_user_organization uo,sys_user u where uo.user_id = u.id and uo.organization_id = s.id ) members FROM sys_organization s,sys_user_organization uo where uo.organization_id = s.id
and uo.user_id= #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
